description_en: Improve your outlook... with Canon Sure Shot BF, composing your shot is easy when you've got an extra large viewfinder. And the focus-free lens lets you capture great photos every time.     The big, easy-to-read LCD counter tells you everything you need to know. With big easy-to-use controls, you can shoot fast and easy with freedom. It's got a powerful built-in flash with 3 settings, including auto flash with red-eye reduction for great, natural-looking photos.
description_fr: Les appareils Sure Shot BF (Big Finder) représentent la dernière génération d'appareils abordables incorporant de nouvelles fonctions et caractéristiques qui facilitent la prise de vue. Le Sure Shot BF est un produit abordable qui comporte plus de caractéristiques intéressantes dans sa catégorie dont viseur de grande taille et optiques de haute qualité     L'appareil Canon Sure Shot BF est un appareil objectif/obturateur compact totalement automatisé doté d'un objectif 32mm pour prise de vue sans mise au point. Le viseur de grande taille en fait le choix idéal pour le premier appareil d'un débutant.

description_en: The Canon Sure Shot BF-10 is made for life's big moments. Fully automatic, this fun-loving, fixed-focus camera has a bold 26mm wide-angle Canon lens that's ideal for photographing groups, scenic views, special occasions - or whatever big plans you have in mind. An extra-large viewfinder makes setting up your shots extra-easy. And once you've got everyone where you want them, all you have to do is push the big button. The camera does it all. It's that simple!    The easy-to-read LCD counter tells you everything you need to know. A powerful built-in Flash with Red-Eye Reduction helps "get the red out". So you can create flash pictures with bright, natural-looking eyes and no spooky red dots.

description_en: Kodak KB28 automatic camera has a motor drive that helps you be ready for the action faster. Its small size and intuitive controls make it simple - and fun - to take lots of good pictures. Several key features provide the ease of use and great pictures of the KB28. It is easy to frame your shots when you look through the KB28's big, bright viewfinder. A special Kodak aspheric 2-element lens, made in the USA, provides exceptionally sharp pictures for this class of camera. The camera automatically advances after you take the picture, so you won't miss the next shot!    As soon as you open the lens cover to start taking pictures, the automatic flash is with you every step of the way. It flashes every time to give you better-exposed pictures, indoors and out. This feature helps you to avoid dark subjects against backlit backgrounds, a situation that often occurs in outdoor shots or pictures taken near windows. It also reduces shadows outdoors in bright sunlight and adds sparkle to subject's eyes. "Auto Off" feature turns off the camera after a minimum of one minute to conserve battery life. KB28 is one of the only cameras in its price range to provide this reassuring feature. To "wake up" the camera, simply close and reopen the lens cover. You can see through the film door whether you have film in the camera, and if you don't load it properly, the camera will not operate. The result is no missed shots due to incorrect film loading. Smaller than many competitors, KB28's compact size makes it easy to carry. A built-in wrist strap makes it easy to take your camera with you!
description_fr: Désirez-vous mémoriser des moments privilégiés, spontanément et sans problèmes? Dans ce cas-là, les appareils Kodak sont ce qu'il vous faut! Une utilisation simple et malgré cela un procédé qui respecte l'environnement, grâce au recyclage des appareils, pour des résultats sans pareils. Faciles à utiliser, et peu encombrant, les appareils Kodak s'emportent partout. Et si par hasard, il vous arrivait d'oublier votre appareil traditionnel à la maison, pas de problèmes, vous trouverez des appareils Kodak dans le monde entier.     Kodak KB 28 est l'appareil 35mm automatique simple à utiliser et abordable. Le flash se déclenche automatiquement lorsque l'éclairage est faible.

Cette mémoire cache de second niveau 256 Ko désignée par Compaq permet au processeur d'augmenter l'efficacité de traitement des données et travailler sans être ralenti. Le micro-processeur peut ainsi accéder plus rapidement aux données et le fonctionnement global de l'ordinateur s'en trouve accéléré.

description_en: Slip it into your pocket or drop it in a purse. The ultra-compact design of Kodak Advantix T550 makes it one of the smallest cameras in its class. The clever flash flips up to put extra distance between flash and lens to help eliminate red-eye problems, and flips down to turn off the camera and protect the lens.    Advantix T550 auto focus camera features triple format selection enabling you to take three different size pictures - Classic (C), Group/HDTV (H), and Panoramic (P) - from the same film cassette. The viewfinder frame changes to match each format selection. You can choose to have date and time information printed on the front and back of your prints or on the back only. With this camera, you can also choose a title from the title-select list and a language (five options) before taking the picture. The selected title will be printed on the back of your photograph. You don't need to worry about accidentally re-exposing your film. Your camera reads the film status indicator (FSI) on the film cassette to prevent re-exposure. A highlighted indicator advances from one symbol to another to identify the status of the film inside the cassette. T550 features magnetic information exchange that records information about lighting conditions and exposure on the film cassette to assist the photofinishing lab with color correction and exposure adjustments, providing you with the best possible results.
description_fr: Style ultra compact pour cet appareil Kodak Advantix T550 autofocus 130 paliers. Son objectif très lumineux (28 mm), son flash rétractable réducteur des yeux rouges et sa distance de mise au point minimale de 40 cm vous apportent toute la technologie nécessaire pour réussir vos photos en intérieur comme en extérieur. Grâce à ses fonctions IX avancées, vous pourrez même inscrire l'heure, la date et des titres au dos de vos photos. Autant d'atouts qui font de cette petite perle le séducteur de la gamme.

description_en: An affordable price, an ultra-compact design, a stylish look and Advanced Photo System technology add up to a fun and fashionable way to take photographs. The new Canon ELPH LT is the world's lightest APS camera with autofocus capabilities. Its sleek and stylish two-tone appearance adds to the fun and lets users make a fashion statement with technology.     Equipped with a 23mm f/4.8 focal length lens, the ELPH LT delivers sharp pictures in virtually any shooting condition. The ELPH LT's active autofocus system is fast and accurate, providing an effective focusing range as close as 60 cm to infinity. In addition to auto and manual ON/OFF settings, the built-in flash offers Slow Synchro and Red-eye Reduction modes to improve picture quality. The ELPH LT incorporates many benefits of APS technology like easy drop-in film loading, auto film advance and rewind, three shooting formats including Classic (C), Wide Angle (H) and Panoramic (P), plus built-in date, time and title functions. The Magnetic Information Exchange (IX) feature enables the ELPH LT to record detailed shooting condition data for every exposure. This information is saved and shared during the photofinishing process, enabling the developer to make appropriate adjustments to produce the best possible prints. 5 available titles in 6 languages may be printed on reverse side of picture: I Love You, Thank You, Season's Greetings, Happy Birthday, Congratulations. For larger-than-life picture quality that fits in the palm of your hand, pick up the Canon ELPH LT.
description_fr: Canon met en permanence l'accent sur l'innovation en introduisant sur le marché de nouvelles idées et de nouvelles technologies, en développant à chaque fois, une meilleure qualité et une plus grande convivialité. Les caméscopes de Canon sont utilisées dans le monde entier pendant plusieurs années, et elles sont toujours renommées pour leur extrême précision associée à des performances éblouissantes et pour leur flexibilité photographique exceptionnelle. Un vaste choix de caméscopes de Canon vous permet de choisir la meilleure solution pour vos besoins comme si vous étiez le photographe professionnel ou le débutant.

description_en: ELPH LT is a compact single focal length autofocus Advanced Photo System camera. The camera, weighing only 115 grams, was introduced at the time of its launch as the world's lightest single focal length Advanced Photo System camera. The model features a stylish design and a sleek silver metallic finish. As do other models in the series, the camera offers a variety of the benefits made possible by the Advanced Photo System, including Information Exchange (IX), which records specific data on the film, using magnetic recording head about how each shot was taken for optimum print results, three print formats while shooting on the same roll of film, a date/title imprint feature, one-touch film loading, and five flash modes.

description_en: Setting a new standard for compactness and affordability, the Canon ELPH Jr. brings the benefits of Advanced Photo System technology to a wider audience. Extremely thin and lightweight, the ELPH Jr.'s physical presence disguises its huge photographic power. Utilizing a new 4-part, 4-group lens design, the ELPH Jr. is equipped with a fast f/2.8 fixed-focal-length lens that delivers sharp, high-contrast images with minimal peripheral aberration. Its precise active AF system assures you of sharp, crisp pictures in a wide variety of shooting situations and a focusing range of 1.5 feet (0,45m) to infinity.    The Advanced Photo System technology provides a wide range of benefits. Film loading is as simple as dropping the Advanced Photo System film cartridge into the chamber. There's no leader film to position on a take-up spool, no wasted film or user error. With the ELPH Jr., you can freely switch to one of three picture formats at any time, at any point in the roll. Take traditional pictures in a 2:3 format using the C (Classic) setting; make sure everyone gets into the group shot with the H (wide angle) mode; and bring home panoramic shots of scenery with the P (Panoramic, 1:3) format, all in one versatile system. Masks in the ELPH Jr.'s viewfinder clearly identify the selected ratio for you, so you'll see exactly what will appear on film. ELPH Jr. goes even further to assure you of quality pictures by magnetically recording five types of digital data on every shot. When your film is developed, Advanced Photo System processing equipment reads the data, called Print Quality Improvement (PQI) and makes automatic adjustments in the developing process to deliver the highest print quality possible. With Canon ELPH Jr., outstanding picture quality is no small feat.
description_fr: Canon met en permanence l'accent sur l'innovation en introduisant sur le marché de nouvelles idées et de nouvelles technologies, en développant à chaque fois, une meilleure qualité et une plus grande convivialité. Les caméscopes de Canon sont utilisées dans le monde entier pendant plusieurs années, et elles sont toujours renommées pour leur extrême précision associée à des performances éblouissantes et pour leur flexibilité photographique exceptionnelle. Un vaste choix de caméscopes de Canon vous permet de choisir la meilleure solution pour vos besoins comme si vous étiez le photographe professionnel ou le débutant.

description_en: Setting a new standard for compactness and affordability, the Canon ELPH Jr. brings the benefits of Advanced Photo System technology to a wider audience. Extremely thin and lightweight, the ELPH Jr.'s physical presence disguises its huge photographic power. Utilizing a new 4-part, 4-group lens design, the ELPH Jr. is equipped with a fast f/2.8 fixed-focal-length lens that delivers sharp, high-contrast images with minimal peripheral aberration. Its precise active AF system assures you of sharp, crisp pictures in a wide variety of shooting situations and a focusing range of 1.5 feet (0,45m) to infinity.    The Advanced Photo System technology provides a wide range of benefits. Film loading is as simple as dropping the Advanced Photo System film cartridge into the chamber. There's no leader film to position on a take-up spool, no wasted film or user error. With the ELPH Jr., you can freely switch to one of three picture formats at any time, at any point in the roll. Take traditional pictures in a 2:3 format using the C (Classic) setting; make sure everyone gets into the group shot with the H (wide angle) mode; and bring home panoramic shots of scenery with the P (Panoramic, 1:3) format, all in one versatile system. Masks in the ELPH Jr.'s viewfinder clearly identify the selected ratio for you, so you'll see exactly what will appear on film. ELPH Jr. goes even further to assure you of quality pictures by magnetically recording five types of digital data on every shot. When your film is developed, Advanced Photo System processing equipment reads the data, called Print Quality Improvement (PQI) and makes automatic adjustments in the developing process to deliver the highest print quality possible. With Canon ELPH Jr., outstanding picture quality is no small feat.
description_fr: Canon met en permanence l'accent sur l'innovation en introduisant sur le marché de nouvelles idées et de nouvelles technologies, en développant à chaque fois, une meilleure qualité et une plus grande convivialité. Les caméscopes de Canon sont utilisées dans le monde entier pendant plusieurs années, et elles sont toujours renommées pour leur extrême précision associée à des performances éblouissantes et pour leur flexibilité photographique exceptionnelle. Un vaste choix de caméscopes de Canon vous permet de choisir la meilleure solution pour vos besoins comme si vous étiez le photographe professionnel ou le débutant.

description_en: Canon has introduced a new member to the award-winning stylish IXUS range - the IXUS X-1 - an outstandingly designed water resistant Advanced Photo System camera.    While retaining the style expected of a Canon IXUS camera, the IXUS X-1 has been designed as a perfect outdoor camera with a water resistant and robust construction, making it ideal for any occasion, wet or dry.    Everything about the IXUS X-1 is purposefully thought through to make it an essential part of your adventure, whether on or off shore. The camera's stylish, metallic edged exterior is constructed out of sturdy, protective material. Canon's Standard Test Method has demonstrated that the combined durability of the tougher casing and the camera's rounded shape makes the IXUS X-1 more robust than most ordinary compacts.    The IXUS X-1 can be used underwater to a depth of 5m. It is simple to use and with a large viewfinder, subjects can be seen clearly, even through goggles or a ski mask.    The camera's controls can be easily operated, even if wearing gloves, as the controls are positioned on a large mode dial, which has a special grip.    Despite the small size, the IXUS X-1 houses a high-performance bright 23mm f/4.8 lens with 5 lenses in 5 groups, which can be used for a variety of shots both on land and underwater. Incorporated in the lens group is an underwater macro lens to take pictures as close as 45cm. Available in a white-gold and aqua green finish, the camera features a mode dial for ease-of-use, five flash modes, self-timer button, red eye reduction, a slow syncro feature to pick-up finer background detail during low light/night time shots and IX data recording functions.    Using Advanced Photo System technology, the IXUS X-1 records the following information for each frame: Date, Time, Print Aspect Ratio (C, H, P), and caption (5 available in 6 languages) for each frame.
description_fr: Avec son design solide et étanche, l'IXUS X-1 est un appareil photo idéal pour une utilisation en extérieur, car il est plus résistant que les compacts traditionnels.    Le large viseur de l'IXUS X-1 permet une mise au point très facile, même à travers un masque de plongée ou des lunettes de ski.    L'IXUS X-1 permet d'enregistrer des informations pour chaque vue, afin de bénéficier de références pour vos photos.    Grâce à une poignée spéciale, les larges commandes sont faciles à utiliser, même si l'utilisateur porte des gants.    Malgré sa petite taille, l'IXUS X-1 est doté d'un objectif de 23 mm pouvant être utilisé dans toutes les situations. De plus, les cinq modes flash et la réduction des yeux rouges garantissent une parfaite exposition en toutes circonstances.

description_en: Through the years, Kodak has led the way with an abundance of new products and processes that have made photography simpler, more useful and more enjoyable. Today, the company's work increasingly involves digital technology, combining the power and convenience of electronics with the quality of traditional photography to produce systems that bring levels of utility and fun to the taking, "making" and utilization of images.    PRODUCT FEATURES:     Ultra-compact 35 mm camera;   Easy picture-taking;   Easy film loading with automatic prewind and advance, with any 35mm color or black-and-white print film with a speed of ISO100, 200, 400, or 1000;   Automatic film-speed sensing (DX/DXN);   Focus-free glass lens;   Swing-up KODAK SENSALITE Flash for red-eye reduction;   Folding viewfinder;   Shutter lock if the batteries are very low or the flash needs charging;   Large liquid-crystal-display (LCD) panel that shows the frame number, low-battery symbol, flash-charging symbol, and mode indicators for fill flash, self-timer, and mid-roll rewind.

Une utilisation simple et malgré cela un procédé qui respecte l'environnement, grâce au recyclage des appareils, pour des résultats sans pareils. Faciles à utiliser, et peu encombrant, les appareils Kodak s'emportent partout. Et si par hasard, il vous arrivait d'oublier votre appareil traditionnel à la maison, pas de problèmes, vous trouverez des appareils Kodak dans le monde entier. description_en: Shopping for a simple to use, fully automatic, focus-free 35mm camera? Then take a look through the new Canon Snappy LXII's. Triple-size viewfinder and you'll stop shopping - and start taking great pictures. The Snappy LXII features a viewfinder three times wider than standard viewfinders. Centered directly over the lens, it makes your entire field of view larger, clearer and easier to see-even if you're wearing glasses. This fully automatic 35mm camera is so compact and lightweight, it travels with you anywhere, so you'll never miss another memory. And its titanium-colored metallic finish makes the Snappy LXII really stand out in a crowd.     The Canon Snappy LXII has everything you're looking for in a point-and-shoot camera. A five-position mode dial on the front gives you easy access to a full range of flash modes, including Red-eye Reduction and a Self Timer. The Snappy LXII also offers Program Auto Exposure with four shutter speeds, so it automatically selects the proper speed to match film type and lighting conditions. You'll never have to worry about under- or over-exposed pictures again. Plus, the Snappy LXII is equipped with automatic film loading, advance and rewind features, leaving you free to just point, and shoot. There's even a Canon Snappy LXII Date model that conveniently prints the month, day and year right on your photos, so you know exactly when precious moments occurred.
description_fr: Canon SNAPPY LX II est l'appareil photo 35 mm entièrement automatique, à chargement facile, doté d'un très grand viseur qui facilite la prise de vue. Il possède également un retardateur pour vous permettre de faire partie de votre photo. L'effet des yeux rouges, qui est produit par la réflexion de l'éclair du flash sur la rétine du sujet, est réduit soit par le déclenchement d'une lampe miniature juste avant celui du flash, soit par un détecteur à infrarouge, soit par un flash rétractable ou escamotable (éloigné de l'objectif).
